2. Alternatives

Perhaps you do not want to talk to anyone about your decision to study. It might help you to know that many people feel that way. Click here to find out more.

Alternatively, you might feel there is nobody you can talk to. If that sounds like your situation then click here to find out more.

3. When Finished

When you are finished exploring your support network click on NEXT to see some Common Support Problems
